basics.description: Emulated on-premises environment and jump-box VMs deployment.

options.text: Please provide the attendee information for your training.

elements.name: numOfAttendees
elements.label: Number of attendees
elements.toolTip: Number of attendees to the training.

options.text: If you are not interested in establishing a VPN with Azure at this time, the Microsoft engineer coordinating the session will help you to deploy a single "emulated on-premises" environment in one of your Azure subscriptions. Then, in the VPN exercises, we can establish VPN tunnels between attendees' VNets and the emulated on-premises VNet.

elements.name: isDeployEmulatedOnPremisesEnv
elements.label: Do you want to deploy the emulated on-premises environment?

elements.name: vpnSharedKey
elements.label: Shared key (PSK)
elements.toolTip: A mixture of letters and numbers, used to establish encryption for the connection. The same shared key must be used in both the virtual network and local network gateways. If your gateway device doesn't provide one, you can make one up here and provide it to your device.

options.text: Please tell the shared key to all attendees. The shared key is needed to do the VPN exercises.

The Jump-box VMs are optional. The Microsoft engineer coordinating the session can deploy one VM for each attendee, facilitating the access to some internet resources, the installation of some required tools and services, etc.

elements.name: isDeployJumpboxVm
elements.label: Do you want to deploy a jump-box VM for each attendee?

elements.name: adminUserName
elements.label: Username
elements.toolTip: The administrator username for the jump-box VM.

constraints.validationMessage: Only alphanumeric characters are allowed, and the value must be 1-20 characters long.

toolTip.password: The administrator password for the jump-box VM.

constraints.customValidationMessage: The password must be alphanumeric, contain at least 12 characters, and have at least 1 letter and 1 number.

options.text: Please tell the account information to all attendees. By default, the administrator account of the all jump-box VMs are set to the above value.

elements.name: osImage
elements.label: Image
elements.toolTip: The operating system image for the jump-box VM.

elements.name: vmSize
elements.label: Size
elements.toolTip: The virtual machine size of the jump-box VMs. Learn more about Virtual Machine sizes

elements.name: diskType
elements.label: OS disk type
elements.toolTip: The OS disk storage type of the jumpbox VMs. Learn more about disk types

elements.name: autoShutdownTime
elements.label: Daily auto-shutdown time
elements.toolTip: The time of day the auto-shutdown of the jump-box VM will occur.

elements.name: autoShutdownTimeZone
elements.label: Auto-shutdown time zone
elements.toolTip: The time zone ID for auto-shutdown time.
